Text: ALRIGHT, PAUSE! RELAX!!! TIME OUT!!!!! CEASE!!!!!!!!!!
Yeh don't gotta hit so bloody HARD man, CHRIST!
I'm gettin' all hot and bothered over here!
It would seem to me as though an apology may be in order, Mr. Pickleberry, ahahahahah......
An apology, hm? Yeah, that's not happening.
The pain you're feeling right now is your body telling you to become stronger. Maybe you should listen to it.
Heh.
... Wuat?
Alright, that's does it.
The deputy's throat.
Is getting slit.
whUH- THE HELL DID I DO???????????????
Well obviously you... you, uh...
Actually, yeah, what did that one do???
The sunglasses man is most fearsome, and would swiftly kick my bum big time.
By contrast, this one is a bit of a wet blanket.
Oh, right! Seems fair.
Woah okay easy now easy now okay relax I think we just need to consider that uh well......
... So, ''Boris'', is it?
Oi, that's BIG BORIS to yeh, dickhead.
(Because you truly are the biggest of boys, ahahahehe...)
(Teehee, oh stop it you...!)
Well, alright, my fault, but...
I mean, can't you see that this is battle is making you two... lose sight of what's really important...?
... Elaborate.
Well, Boris- uh, ''Big Boris'', you seem awfully fixated on my boss Travis over there.
And I noticed that, y'know, he's wearing a bit of green right?
Any... any other green guys you'd be better of spending time with?
(Sniffles) You're right...
... You're totally damn well right lad.................
Well, this encounter has truly been illuminating.
Thank you, sunglasses man. Remind me to _____ in the future.
I will be sure to do that.
Alrighty lads, off we pop!!!
Interesting bunch.
I assume that's not usually how these things go, huh.
Not really, no.
Well, lead the way Travis.
